mapper.select: SELECT cr.id, cr.caregiver_id, cr.report_date, cr.content, cr.status, cr.created_at, cr.updated_at FROM caregiver_reports cr WHERE cr.caregiver_id = #{caregiverId} ORDER BY cr.report_date DESC, cr.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT cr.id, cr.caregiver_id, cr.report_date, cr.content, cr.status, cr.created_at, cr.updated_at FROM caregiver_reports cr WHERE cr.caregiver_id = #{caregiverId} AND cr.report_date = #{reportDate} LIMIT 1
SELECT cr.id, cr.caregiver_id, cr.report_date, cr.content, cr.status, cr.created_at, cr.updated_at FROM caregiver_reports cr WHERE cr.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO caregiver_reports ( id, caregiver_id, report_date, content, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{caregiverId}, #{reportDate}, #{content}, COALESCE(#{status}, 'pending') )
mapper.select: SELECT cr.id, cr.caregiver_id, cr.report_date, cr.content, cr.status, cr.created_at, cr.updated_at FROM caregiver_reports cr WHERE cr.caregiver_id = #{caregiverId} ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT cr.id, cr.caregiver_id, cr.report_date, cr.content, cr.status, cr.created_at, cr.updated_at FROM caregiver_reports cr WHERE cr.caregiver_id = #{caregiverId} AND cr.report_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY cr.report_date DESC

SELECT cr.id, cr.caregiver_id, cr.report_date, cr.content, cr.status, cr.created_at, cr.updated_at FROM caregiver_reports cr WHERE cr.caregiver_id = #{caregiverId} AND cr.status = #{status} ORDER BY cr.report_date DESC
